thread.title: Donna
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Donna

author: Donna
title: Donna
text: I was in a situation that I needed a specific piece of furniture to TAKE WITH ME to make my mom more comfortable in the rehab facility I had to move her to. The rehab facility did not have furniture to accommodate my mother's needs. HomeZone doesn't normally sell floor pieces, as people normally order and have furniture shipped. But they understood my immediate need and offered 3 pieces to choose from that they would sell the floor model. The piece worked great for mom. Thank you.
